selected_quotes: How good are faculty at predicting resident burnout? Not so good. Faculty predicted: 17% Actual: 70%
Burnout goes undetected in some residencies. Sad! PittEM leads because we have a #resident dedicated to #wellness
Interesting ... EM Trainees Reported Burnout Rate of 70%. EM Faculty Predicted Trainee Burnout Rate of 16%. #FOAMed ht…
@erdrdeb @ChaiyaMD @JasonJpb12345 @jbc0730 We'd better get better at recognizing burnout! Should probably recognize it inte…
WOW 70%!?! #meded we need 2 address #physicianburnout We need 2 rethink #resilience #physicianwellness
